name: Devil Tower Warrior
description:
The faramita of breeze，full the breath of blood..
The sea of blaze,protected by haveLost boat..
The plain of ice,rest wrath of evil..
The slit of dark,hiding the moring of holy light..
The tower of light,have fool of shadows..


The ancient mantra are spread on the mainland, and all this implies the devil tower located in the navel of the earth?

Game features:
- Rich map
The game has dozens of labyrinth maps with different themes, which will fully satisfy your desire to explore.

- Perfect maze mechanism
The maze in the game is generated by random generation of the algorithm, and the real random map will be added in subsequent versions.

- Classic turn-based battle
The game perfectly restores the essence of the Japanese turn-based RPG and optimizes the operating experience.

- rich role matching
The game has 5 characters with distinctive characteristics. You can choose 3 teams to form a team. I will add new careers in subsequent versions.

- A huge skill system
Each character has its own unique skills, with nearly 100 skills in an orderly system.

- Unique equipment manufacturing system
Here, all the equipment, you can make it yourself, there are surprises when manufacturing
